verses.verse: The <S%H410>mighty<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, even the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> unto the going down <S%H3996>there<s%>.
Out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3313>shined<s%>.

Our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall not keep <S%H2790>silence<s%>: a <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3966>him<s%>, and it shall be very <S%H8175>stormy<s%> round about <S%H5439>him<s%>.
He shall <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> from <S%H5920>above<s%>, and to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that he may <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
<S%H622>Gather<s%> my <S%H2623>saints<s%> together unto <S%H3772>me<s%>; those that have made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me by <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5542>himself<s%>. Selah.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>; O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> against <S%H430>you<s%>: I am God, even your <S%H430>God<s%>.
I will not <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> you for your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> or your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, that have been continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
I will <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H6499>bullock<s%> out of your <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor he <S%H6260>goats<s%> out of your <S%H4356>folds<s%>.
For every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> is <S%H929>mine<s%>, and the cattle upon a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2042>hills<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: and the wild <S%H2123>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H5978>mine<s%>.
If I were <S%H7456>hungry<s%>, I would not <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H8398>you<s%>: for the world is <S%H4393>mine<s%>, and the fullness there.
Will I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls<s%>, or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>goats<s%>?
<S%H2076>Offer<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; and <S%H7999>pay<s%> your <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the most <S%H5945>High<s%>:
And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>: I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> <S%H3513>you<s%>, and you shall glorify me.

But unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>says<s%>, What have you to do to <S%H5608>declare<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, or that you should <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?
Seeing you <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> behind <S%H310>you<s%>.
When you <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%>, then you <S%H7521>consented<s%> with <S%H2506>him<s%>, and have been partaker with <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>.
You <S%H7971>give<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frames<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
You <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against your <S%H251>brother<s%>; <S%H5414>you<s%> <S%H1848>slander<s%> your own <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.

These things have you <S%H6213>done<s%>, and I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>; you <S%H1819>thought<s%> that I was <S%H1961>altogether<s%> such a one as <S%H3198>yourself<s%>: but I will rebuke <S%H6186>you<s%>, and set them in order before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Now <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H7911>this<s%>, you that forget <S%H433>God<s%>, lest I tear you in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, and there be none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.

Whoever <S%H2076>offers<s%> <S%H8426>praise<s%> <S%H3513>glorifies<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>: and to him that orders his <S%H1870>behavior<s%> rightly will I <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
